title: Pluralsight - Introduction to NServiceBus
description: NServiceBus is an open source service bus built on the .NET platform. It combines the durability of store-and-forward queuing technologies like MSMQ with reliability-enhancing features such as retries and error queues. With durable publish and subscribe facilities, NServiceBus is a perfect fit as the communication backbone for your event driven architectures, enabling you to build robust systems able to withstand the harsh reality of production environments
